reviewText: My three year old has a new interest in the Bear songs.  Since this is not one of the most recent Disney shows, it has been difficult to find "Bear in the Big Blue House".  I can always count on Amazon.

Bear does it again teaching children the seasons while entertaining at the same time. This is a good way to keep you child busy while they learn. Bear teaches values and helpful information such as seasons, shapes, colors, potty training, brushing teeth, bathing, sharing, friendship, and alot more.

As with all the other Bear videos, there is learning a concept, singing and playing and the shadow puppets.  This DVD has 3 episodes, starting with Autumn, with pumpkins, piles of leaves, to Summer where they spend a lazy day swimming and relaxing, to an All-Weather episode that runs through snow, rain and fun to be had in all kinds of weather.  My 2-3/4 year old loves this DVD and since it has continuous mode play, he can watch and play while it runs in the background.  Includes 6 padded glow-in-the dark wall character stickers sure to delight any toddler.
Bought this for my son and he loves them!!! Really fun to watch and learn with bear!
I was searching for this DVD and I was very happy that I found it and got it very fast from Amazon
Wonderful DVD. My two-year old granddaughter just loves it. Lots of good material which is age appropriate. What a wonderful character
Great gift for my neice. She loves Bear. I would recommend these to anyone with kids in their lives. Such a fun show.
I still haven't received this item yet, so I cannot review it.  Sent an email to the vendor.  I'm still waiting for it.

All the Bear in the Big Blue House dvd's are excellent for toddlers and preschoolers-sort of a lost treasure in children's television programming! This DVD is no exception. Content is educational and entertaining. Music is good. Your young children will enjoy it.
Love these DVDs. I bought them for my 18 month old grandson and he loves bear too. It is colorful and the characters are delightful.
My autistic son loves Bear in the big Blue house. I could not find bear ANYWHERE until i found it on AMAZON. Bear Rocks!!
My one year old daughter loves it and my son loved it when he was two! Plus, mom and dad think it's amusing too. :)
This dvd is so great for kids and even the adults that watch along as it is entertaining and educational and fun for all!!
perfect for my son
